verses.name: Psalms 84:1
verses.text: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O Lord of hosts!

verses.name: Psalms 84:2
verses.text: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the Lord: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.

verses.name: Psalms 84:3
verses.text: Yea, the sparrow hath found an house, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young, even thine altars, O Lord of hosts, my King, and my God.

verses.name: Psalms 84:4
verses.text: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house: they will be still praising thee. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 84:5
verses.text: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.

verses.name: Psalms 84:6
verses.text: Who passing through the valley of Baca make it a well; the rain also filleth the pools.

verses.name: Psalms 84:7
verses.text: They go from strength to strength, every one of them in Zion appeareth before God.

verses.name: Psalms 84:8
verses.text: O Lord God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 84:9
verses.text: Behold, O God our shield, and look upon the face of thine anointed.

verses.name: Psalms 84:10
verses.text: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.

verses.name: Psalms 84:11
verses.text: For the Lord God is a sun and shield: the Lord will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.

verses.name: Psalms 84:12
verses.text: O Lord of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
